articles.title: Why many young adults turn on TV or movie subtitles, according to a new poll - AP News
articles.description: A new poll finds that younger adults are more likely to use subtitles while watching TV or movies than are older adults. About 4 in 10 adults under 45 use subtitles at least “often” when watching TV or movies, compared with about 3 in 10 adults over 45. That'…
